content: one skein basket crochet this happy one skein basket in no time learning a few essential techniques too this sweet little basket may be used for many different purposes it is crocheted from the bottom up starting with a magic ring circle materials one skein of plymouth yarn fantasy naturale 100% mercerized cotton yarn 140 yards size g 4 0mm crochet hook one locking stitch marker yarn needle the bottom of the basket is 6 in diameter x 5 tall x 18 in circumference gauge is 4 sts /inch directions using the magic_ring technique sc6 stitches https //www youtube com/watch v=sluaywx0-we round 1 single_crochet single_crochet into the first single_crochet to connect the round pm place marker single_crochet into that stitch again continue 2sc into each stitch 12 stitches round 2 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next stitch *sc2 into next stitch sc1 repeat from * to the end of the round 18 stitches round 3 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 2 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc2 repeat from * to the end of the round 24 stitches round 4 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 3 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc3 repeat from * to the end of the round 30 stitches round 5 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 4 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc4 repeat from * to the end of the round 36 stitches round 6 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 5 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc5 repeat from * to the end of the round 42 stitches round 7 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 6 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc6 repeat from * to the end of the round 48 stitches round 8 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 7 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc7 repeat from * to the end of the round 54 stitches round 9 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 8 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc8 repeat from * to the end of the round 60 stitches round 10 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 9 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc9 repeat from * to the end of the round 66 stitches round 11 remove marker single_crochet the first stitch replace the marker sc1 into same stitch sc1 into next 10 stitches *sc2 into next stitch sc10 repeat to the end of the round 72 stitches round 12 bottom ridge remove marker single_crochet into the back of the first stitch replace
